  3. Sgurr Breac

Sgurr Breac

Hear pronunciation Press to hear pronunciation

Together with its neighbour A' Chailleach, Sgurr Breac is one of the western Fannichs, and it shows a very steep face to the north.

 You have not climbed Sgurr Breac.

Region: Ullapool

Altitude: 999 metres

Users' Rating:
  • Currently 3.43/5
Rating: 3.4/5 (54 votes cast)

You must be registered and signed-in to vote

Detailed route description and map

Sgurr Breac and a' Chailleach from near Braemore

Other routes and challenges

Sgurr Breac can also be ascended via its eastern ridge.

The pair of Munros are well seperated from Sgurr nan Clach Geala, making any longer traverse - possibly including all of the Fannichs - into a very demanding expedition.

Walker-friendly accommodation in the area

Ullapool Hotels

Ullapool B&B

Ullapool Cottages

Ullapool & Assynt Hostels
